PrecisRegulations Amending the ATLANTIC PILOTAGE AUTHORITY REGULATIONS to expand the types of ships eligible to apply for a written waiver of compulsory pilotage in respect of ships carrying out dredging work and allow them to move wihtin the confined area specified in the waive, without the services of a pilot.
